data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Senapati that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Senapati, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Senapati.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Senapati, Manipur, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Senapati to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Thoubalkonou people.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Senapati, Manipur, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 3,289 believers in the county of Senapati into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Senapati that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Senapati
location.people_groups_list: Meitei Kshatriya, Hrangkhol, Barman, Meitei Thanga, Meitei (Manipur Muslim)
